text: AyikokoMprofeti okokuba abe namabanjwa emfazwe (aze awakhulule ngentlawuliso) engadanga wohlwaya (iintshaba zakhe) kanobom emhlabeni. Nina ninqwenela izinto ezintle zeli hlabathi (imali yentlawuliso yokukhulula abathinjwa), kodwa Yena uAllâh Uninqwenelela uBomi Obuzayo. Kananjalo uAllâh nguSomandla uSobulumko
